description: This fantasy scene is about a sexy fireman (Ricky) who rang at my door to let me know that my next door neighbor had a small kitchen fire. He asked my permission to inspect my house, to be sure it was safe. While inspecting a couple of rooms, Ricky saw the Maskurbate website open on my laptop. He asked to know more about me. I told him I was a producer and this was my website. Then he asked if I was looking for models. I knew then that he wanted to give it a try. So I let him show me what he had to offer...
title: The Big Hose, Scene #01
